title: Filipino pork afritada
ingredients: ['1kg boneless pork, cut into bite-sized pieces', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1/2 lemon, juiced', "900g pig's liver", '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 potatoes, quartered', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 large tomatoes, diced', '1 green pepper, cut into chunks', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
